summary:
A massive player home with everything you would every need!
See the page for all the features!
descriptionHtml:
Mziki is a massive player home located near Rorikstead which will blow your mind!

N.B: Currently is in beta, report all bugs in the comments below!

Mziki has:
✔Two incredible arenas in which you can watch or participate in massive, unlimited NPC fights!
✔A massive armoury containing over 15 mannequins and other armoury items!
✔A scenic master room containing every jewellery item in the game!
✔An Alchemy table with every single alchemy ingredient in the game -- 20 times!!
✔An Echanting table with enough soul gems to last a lifetime!
✔A library containing every book in the game!
✔Every ore and ingot in the game easily accessible for smithing!
✔A cave system in which you can fight enemies and mine plenty of ore!
✔A Smelting Station
✔A Tanning Station
✔A Workbench
✔A Grindstone
✔A Dining room featuring every food item in the game, a bar, a cooking station and a table to eat on!
✔All the Dragon Priest Masks!
✔All the Daedric Artifacts!
✔All the Standing Stones in the game!

Coming Soon!
✔A Nordic Ruin complex!
✔A Dwemer Ruin complex!
✔An even bigger arena with more traps and fun!
author: Hugh Bellamy
